creator: Sadhana.Chandaravanka@pearson.com
text:
The whole screen is becoming blank and repaint is not happening..

Has anyone else seen this problem?any solution/work around is of great help..


Error stack trace at the command prompt(where I run jmeter.bat) is as below..

creator: woolfel@yahoo.com
text:
I'm not sure what the exact cause of this is. It looks like a jre problem, since
i don't see which jmeter class was the trigger of the exception.

peter

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: Does not seem to happen any more
